message:
Dear {{doc.customer}},

Thank you for your reservation at Sunfit. Your booking details are as follows:

Guest Name: {{doc.guest_cf}}
Arrival Date: {{doc.check_in_cf}}
Departure Date: {{doc.check_out_cf}}
Length of Stay: {{doc.no_of_nights_cf}} Nights
Room Type: {{doc.room_type_cf}}
Rate/Night: {{doc.room_rate_cf}}

Facilities:

We provide a wide range of complimentary wellness facilities which include: Gym, Swimming Pool, Tennis Court, Squash Courts and Table Tennis.

Other paid services include: spa treatments, unisex salon, laundry services.

Cancellations:

Please notify us of any cancellations at least 24 hours prior to arrival. One full night's accommodation will be charged for guaranteed bookings where guests do not arrive or cancel within the stated time.

Check-in time is 2:00pm; availability of rooms for early arrivals cannot be guaranteed.

A valid ID is required at check-in.

If you have any inquiries, please contact our 24 hours reception desk on 08096320300, 08096320302.

Payment Details

Account Name: Sunfit International Limited
Bank: Fidelity Bank
Account Number: 4010480839

We are looking forward to welcoming you and hope you have a very pleasant stay.

Warm regards,

SUNFIT… Fitness, Spa, Accommodation

message:
Dear {{doc.room_guest_detail[0].first_name}}

We are delighted to have you at SUNFIT.

Whether you are here on business or pleasure, we provide a wide variety of facilities and a team of dedicated Staff to ensure your stay is both comfortable and leisurely.

During your stay, we strongly advise that you keep your windows closed to prevent insects from entering your room. For security reasons, movement is restricted between the hours of 12:00am - 5:00am; guests coming in or out of the premises within these hours will be required to go through a security check.

This is a non-smoking facility; guests will be checked out immediately on violation.

Our guest facilities and services include:

• Breakfast Buffet served at the restaurant from 6:30am to 10:00am
• The Gym opens from 5:00am to 11:00pm. Aerobic classes are complimentary for room guests and holds at 8:00am and 7:00pm, Monday – Saturday.
• Steam and Sauna rooms are also complimentary and opens from 8:00am to 10:00pm. Spa and Salon services are available on request.
• The swimming pool is open from 8:00am to 8:00pm, while the squash and tennis courts are open from 6:00am to 10:00pm.

Please note that the facilities are for the exclusive use of the room guest(s) only. We welcome visiting guests accompanied by you at an additional charge of N2000 per facility.

Please call the reception on 111 for any assistance needed.

We wish you a warm welcome and a very pleasant stay.

Thank you for choosing Sunfit!!!

name: Just Checking In
subject: Just Checking In

message:
Dear {{doc.customer_name}},

In our busy lives and daily hustle, we sometimes forget to take care of the most important thing, “our health”.

This is to remind you to check your Blood Pressure today.

Other health metrics to pay attention to are your blood sugar levels and Body Mass Index. Remember to take some time out for “yourself”, relax and do some of the things YOU love.

Stay Active, Live Healthy and Love Life!!
name: Reminder: Check your Blood Pressure
subject: Reminder: Check your Blood Pressure

message:
Dear {{doc.customer_name}},

It’s time to update your fitness metrics.

On your next visit to the Club, kindly request the instructor to take your measurements for your profile update. This will include:

- Blood Pressure
- Heart Rate
- Body Mass Index
- Body Measurements

Note that the instructors are not medical practitioners, and this does not replace your regular hospital check-up. If your blood pressure reading is high, please visit the hospital as soon as possible for proper treatment.

Please log in below to view your membership profile.

Client Portal - Link

For feedback or enquiries, please contact the marketing manager, Esther on 0809589089

Stay Active, Live Healthy and Love Life!!!
name: Update Your Fitness Metrics
subject: Update Your Fitness Metrics
